name: Cape of Conjuring
description: Worn about the shoulders, this item increases the duration of all your spells by 3.

name: Dragon Wing Tabard
description: Worn on the shoulders, this item increases your Knowledge and Power skills by +2.

name: Vampire's Cowl
description: Worn about the shoulders, this cowl increases your Necromancy skill by 10%.

name: Ambassador's Sash
description: Worn about the shoulders, the Ambassador's Sash reduces the cost of surrendering.

name: Cape of Velocity
description: Worn about the shoulders, this cape increases the combat speed of all your units by +2.

name: Everflowing Crystal Cloak
description: When worn, this cloak increases your Crystal production by +1 per day.

name: Recanter's Cloak
description: While wearing this cloak, neither you nor your opponent will be able to cast level 3 or higher spells during combat.

name: Surcoat of Counterpoise
description: Worn about the shoulders, this item increases your Magic Resistance by 10%.

name: Angel Wings
description: Worn about the shoulders, these wings allow you to fly.
